descriptions.sonic: Creates a Sonic speech bubble image
descriptions.broadcast: Broadcasts a playing message until the command is run again or the bot restarts
descriptions.channel: Enables/disables classic commands in a channel (use server settings for slash commands)
descriptions.command: Enables/disables a classic command for a server (use server settings for slash commands)
descriptions.count: Gets how many times every command was used
descriptions.donate: Learn more about how you can support esmBot's development
descriptions.image: Searches for images across the web
descriptions.mediareload: Attempts to reconnect to all available media processing servers
descriptions.mediastats: Gets some statistics about the media servers
descriptions.info: Gets some info and credits about me
descriptions.raw: Gets a direct image URL (useful for saving GIFs from sites like Tenor)
descriptions.snowflake: Converts a Discord snowflake id into a timestamp
descriptions.soundreload: Attempts to reconnect to all available Lavalink nodes
descriptions.bounce: Makes an image bounce up and down
descriptions.caption: Adds a caption to an image
descriptions.caption2: Adds a bottom caption/tag list to an image
descriptions.circle: Applies a radial blur effect on an image
descriptions.flag: Overlays a flag onto an image
descriptions.freeze: Makes an image sequence only play once
descriptions.gamexplain: Makes a GameXplain thumbnail from an image
descriptions.gif: Converts an image into a GIF
descriptions.haah: Mirrors the left side of an image onto the right
descriptions.hooh: Mirrors the bottom of an image onto the top
descriptions.jpeg: Adds JPEG compression to an image
descriptions.magik: Adds a content aware scale effect to an image
descriptions.meme: Generates a meme from an image (separate top/bottom text with a comma)
descriptions.petpet: Adds a hand petting the image
descriptions.reddit: Adds a Reddit watermark to an image
descriptions.scott: Makes Scott the Woz show off an image
descriptions.slide: Slides an image in a direction
descriptions.snapchat: Adds a Snapchat style caption to an image
descriptions.soos: "Loops" an image sequence by reversing it when it's finished
descriptions.speechbubble: Adds a speech bubble to an image
descriptions.spotify: Adds a Spotify "This is" header to an image
descriptions.stretch: Stretches an image to a 1:1 aspect ratio
descriptions.tile: Creates a tile pattern from an image
descriptions.uncanny: Makes a Mr. Incredible Becomes Uncanny image (separate left/right text with a comma)
descriptions.uncaption: Removes the caption from an image
descriptions.vignette: Adds a vignette to an image
descriptions.waaw: Mirrors the right side of an image onto the left
descriptions.wall: Creates a wall from an image
descriptions.whisper: Adds a Whisper style caption to an image
descriptions.wide: Stretches an image to 19x its width
descriptions.woow: Mirrors the top of an image onto the bottom
descriptions.tags: The main tags command. Check the help page for more info: https://esmbot.net/help.html

8ball.question: A question you want to ask the ball

avatar.member: The member to get the avatar from

banner.member: The member to get the banner from

channel.enable: Enables classic commands in a channel
channel.disable: Disables classic commands in a channel

count.command: A specific command to view counts for

emote.emoji: The emoji you want to get

eval.broadcast: Execute on all bot processes (only use if you know what you're doing!)

help.command: A command to view info about

image.query: The query you want to search for

lengthen.url: The URL you want to lengthen

prefix.prefix: The server prefix you want to use

reload.skipsend: Skips sending new application command data to Discord

youtube.query: The query you want to search for

caption.noegg: Disable... something. Not saying what it is though.
caption.font: Specify the font you want to use (default: futura)

caption2.top: Put the caption on the top of an image instead of the bottom
caption2.font: Specify the font you want to use (default: helvetica)

freeze.endframe: Set the end frame (default: last frame)

globe.snow: Turns the globe into a snow globe

hue.shift: Set the amount to shift by

meme.case: Make the meme text case-sensitive (allows for lowercase text)
meme.font: Specify the font you want to use (default: impact)

motivate.font: Specify the font you want to use (default: times)

slide.reverse: Changes the direction the image slides in

snapchat.position: Set the position of the caption as a decimal (0.0 is top, 1.0 is bottom, default is 0.565)

speechbubble.alpha: Make the top of the speech bubble transparent
speechbubble.bottom: Puts the speech bubble on the bottom of the image
speechbubble.scale: A multiplier to resize the speech bubble (0.01 is smallest, 1.0 is largest, default is 0.2)

uncanny.font: Specify the font you want to use (default: helvetica)
uncanny.phase: Specify the uncanny image you want to use

uncaption.tolerance: Set the shade tolerance for the caption detection (0.0 is highest, 1.0 is lowest, default is 0.95)

watermark.9gag: Adds the 9GAG watermark to an image
watermark.avs4you: Adds the avs4you watermark to an image
watermark.bandicam: Adds the Bandicam watermark to an image
watermark.deviantart: Adds a DeviantArt watermark to an image
watermark.funky: Adds the New Funky Mode banner to an image
watermark.hypercam: Adds the Hypercam watermark to an image
watermark.ifunny: Adds the iFunny watermark to an image
watermark.kinemaster: Adds the KineMaster watermark to an image
watermark.memecenter: Adds the MemeCenter watermark to an image
watermark.powerdirector: Adds the PowerDirector watermark to an image
watermark.shutterstock: Adds the Shutterstock watermark to an image

music.host: Gets or changes the host of the current voice session
music.play: Plays a song or adds it to the queue
music.remove: Removes a song from the queue
music.seek: Seeks to a different position in the music
music.volume: Sets the volume of the music

music host.user: The user you want the new host to be

music play.query: An audio search query or URL

music remove.position: The queue position you want to remove

tags.list: Lists every tag in this server
tags.owner: Gets the owner of a tag

tags role.add: Allow a role to manage tags
tags role.list: List the roles that are capable of managing tags
tags role.remove: Remove a role from the allowlist

channel.notDisabled: I'm not disabled in this channel!

command.adminOnly: You need to be an administrator to enable/disable commands!

command.noInput: You need to provide what command to enable/disable!

tags.roleRemoved: The role `{{name}}` has been removed from the list of allowed roles.

error: Uh oh! I ran into an error while running this command. Please report the content of the attached file at the following link or on the esmBot Support server:
guildOnly: This command only works in servers!

image.couldNotFind: I couldn't find an image in that message!

flags.ephemeral: Attempt to send output as an ephemeral/temporary response
flags.spoiler: Attempt to send output as a spoiler
flags.text: The text to put on the image

image.frames: That GIF has way too many frames (over 1000)!
image.jobEnded: Something happened to the media servers before I could receive the output. Try running your command again.
image.large: That file is too large (>= 40MB)! Try using a smaller file.
image.nocmd: That command isn't supported on this instance of esmBot.
image.noanim: That image isn't in an animated format (GIF or WEBP)!
image.noImage: You need to provide an image/GIF!
image.noResult: I couldn't get a response from the media server. Please try again.
image.noServers: I can't seem to contact the media servers, they might be down or still trying to start up. Please wait a little bit.
image.noTempServer: The resulting file was larger than Discord's upload limit, so I can't upload it.
image.noParam: You need to provide some text!
image.notWorking: I couldn't find a way to process this image; this likely means that I haven't been set up correctly. Please contact the bot owner.
image.processing: Processing... This might take a while
image.ratelimit: I've been ratelimited by the server hosting that image. Try uploading your image somewhere else.
image.selected: The image has been selected for your next command.
image.tempSite: The result was larger than Discord's upload limit, so it was uploaded to an external site instead.
image.tenor: I've been rate-limited by Tenor. Please try uploading your GIF elsewhere.
image.timeout: The request to get that image timed out. Please try again, upload your image elsewhere, or use another image.
image.timeoutDownload: The request timed out before I could download that image. Try uploading your image somewhere else or reducing its size.
image.tip: (Tip: try right-clicking/holding on a message and press Apps -> Select Image, then try again.)
image.tooLarge: The resulting file was too large to upload. Try again with a smaller image if possible.
image.tooLong: The image is taking too long to process (>=10 minutes), so the job was cancelled. Try using a smaller image.
image.tryAgain: This job couldn't be completed because the server it was running on went down. Try running your command again.
image.unknown: The output wasn't in a recognizable format. Please try again.

noDatabase: This command is unavailable on stateless instances of esmBot.

pagination.cantChangePage: You can't change the page on a command you didn't run!
pagination.jumpTo: What page do you want to jump to?

permissions.noAttachFiles: I don't have the `Attach Files` permission!
permissions.noEmbedLinks: I don't have the `Embed Links` permission!

sound.addedToQueue: Your {{type}} `{{name}}` has been added to the queue!
sound.cantJoin: I can't join this voice channel! Make sure I have the right permissions.
sound.endedInChannel: The voice channel session in `{{channel}}` has ended.
sound.error: Looks like there was an error during sound playback:
sound.newHost: {{member}} is the new voice channel host.
sound.noConnection: Something odd happened to the voice connection; try playing your song again.
sound.noManager: The sound commands are still starting up!
sound.noResponse: I couldn't get a response from the audio server.
sound.notConnected: I'm not connected to any audio servers!
sound.notInVoice: I'm not in a voice channel!
sound.notVoiceChannel: The channel I was given isn't a voice channel!
sound.noVoiceState: You need to be in a voice channel first!
sound.noYouTube: YouTube playback is disabled on this instance.
sound.serversDown: Hmmm, seems that all of the audio servers are down. Try again in a bit.
sound.title: Title
sound.waitingForHost: Waiting 10 seconds for the host to return...
sound.waitingForSomeone: Waiting 10 seconds for someone to return...
